mapper.select: SELECT IDX , MENU_ID , TITLE , CONT , WRITER , TO_CHAR(REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') REGDATE , READCOUNT , BNUM , LVL , STEP , NREF FROM BOARD WHERE MENU_ID = #{ menu_id } ORDER BY NREF DESC, STEP ASC
SELECT IDX , MENU_ID , TITLE , CONT , WRITER , TO_CHAR(REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') REGDATE , READCOUNT , BNUM , LVL , STEP , NREF FROM BOARD WHERE IDX = #{ idx }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( IDX, MENU_ID, TITLE, CONT, WRITER, BNUM, LVL, STEP, NREF ) VALUES ( ( SELECT NVL(MAX(IDX), 0)+1 FROM BOARD ), #{ menu_id }, #{ title }, #{ cont }, #{ writer }, ( SELECT NVL(MAX(BNUM), 0)+1 FROM BOARD ), 0, 0, ( SELECT NVL(MAX(NREF), 0)+ 1 FROM BOARD ) )
